description: Ten weekly online quizzes accompanying pre-recorded lectures, involving exercises and MATLAB usage for statistical analysis. Immediate feedback provided after submission.
40-minute test in Week 7 covering first 5 weeks' content, conducted in computing labs. Includes multiple-choice questions, numerical/text responses, and MATLAB tasks for statistical analysis.

1-hour exam during university examination period assessing all course content. Features multiple question formats including MATLAB data analysis tasks. Feedback available through course convenor inquiry.
